DOC.brief_summary: Albendazole is a main anti-helminth, however there is a lack of data regarding its efficacy in the school children population. The aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of the albendazole one versus two and three doses, in school children infected with intestinal helminth.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Albendazole to Treat Intestinal Helminths and Its Effect on Gut Microflora
DOC.criteria: presence of intestinal helminths eggs in the stool allergy to imidazole derivate No intestinal helminths
